item.title: Aria
item.description: A VR experience that takes you on a gliding journey across mountains and valleys to plant seeds and create euphoric soundscape.

item.title: Haptic Simulator
item.description: A prototype dental haptic simulator for periodontal training.

item.title: Illuminated
item.description: Illuminated is an adventurous and thrilling first person shooter VR game

item.title: Interactive Gallery x Guggenheim Abu Dhabi
item.description: An interactive gallery experience in partnership with Guggenheim Abu Dhabi

item.title: Interactive Human Digital Avatar
item.description: Intelligent chatbot that answers your questions

item.title: Luminous Necklace
item.description: A necklace that shows different light colors according to your mood and preference.

item.title: Robonica
item.description: A robotic telepresence research project that allows you to move around and explore a remote space from your phone.

item.title: Special Effect Makeup
item.description: Using prosthetic sculpting, molding and casting techniques to create advanced cosmetic effects.

item.title: Aerial Photography
item.description: A chat with a random stranger on the high speed rail to Shanghai in 2015 sparkled my interest in aerial photography.

item.title: Film Photography
item.description: Wabi-sabi (侘寂), the traditional Japanese aesthetics that focuses on finding beauty within the imperfections and transience, summarizes the reason why I fall in love with film photography.

item.title: Graphic Design and Illustrations
item.description: Digital design and illustrations using Illustrator and Photoshop.

item.title: Sketches and Paintings
item.description: 2D sketches using pencil, charcoal and acrylic.
